mapper.select: SELECT store_id, store_name, store_category, store_avgstar, store_mainimage, store_address, store_tel FROM store ORDER BY store_avgstar DESC, store_id DESC

SELECT store_id, store_name, store_address, store_latitude, store_longitude, store_avgstar, store_intro, store_mainimage, store_category, store_capacity, store_tel FROM store WHERE store_id = #{storeId}

SELECT store_id, store_name, store_category, store_avgstar, store_mainimage, store_address, store_tel FROM store
AND store_category LIKE CONCAT(#{category}, '%')
ORDER BY store_avgstar DESC, store_id DESC LIMIT 100

SELECT store_id, store_name, store_category, store_avgstar, store_mainimage, store_address, store_tel FROM store
AND ( store_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR store_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR store_category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR store_intro LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY CASE WHEN store_name LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%') THEN 1 WHEN store_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') THEN 2 WHEN store_category LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%') THEN 3 WHEN store_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') THEN 4 ELSE 5 END, store_avgstar DESC, store_id DESC LIMIT 100

SELECT store_id, store_name, store_category, store_avgstar, store_mainimage, store_address, store_tel FROM store
AND store_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{storeName}, '%')
ORDER BY CASE WHEN store_name LIKE CONCAT(#{storeName}, '%') THEN 1 WHEN store_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{storeName}, '%') THEN 2 ELSE 3 END, store_avgstar DESC, store_id DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT store_id, store_name, store_category, store_avgstar, store_mainimage, store_address, store_tel FROM store
AND store_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{address}, '%')
ORDER BY CASE WHEN store_address LIKE CONCAT(#{address}, '%') THEN 1 WHEN store_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{address}, '%') THEN 2 ELSE 3 END, store_avgstar DESC, store_id DESC LIMIT 50
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store ( store_name, store_address, store_latitude, store_longitude, store_avgstar, store_intro, store_mainimage, store_category, store_capacity, store_tel ) VALUES ( #{storeName}, #{storeAddress}, #{storeLatitude}, #{storeLongitude}, #{storeAvgstar}, #{storeIntro}, #{storeMainimage}, #{storeCategory}, #{storeCapacity}, #{storeTel} )
